summary: A drama following 4 women at stage school. Considered by some to be the summation of director Jacques Rivette's work as a whole.
cast: Bulle Ogier|Benoît Régent|Fejria Deliba|Laurence Côte|Bernadette Giraud|Inês de Medeiros|Nathalie Richard|Pascale Salkin|Dominique Rousseau|Agnès Sourdillion|Irina Dalle|Caroline Gasser|Irène Jacob|Florence Lannuzel|Françoise Muxel|Karine Bayard|Marucha Bo|Jean Le Scouarnec|Albert Dupontel|Michel Vuillermoz|Sophie Niedergang
title: La bande des quatre
